title: Keyhunter Maps
description: Map definitions for the Keyhunter app

width.description: Width of the image in pixels

height.description: Height of the image in pixels

wh.description: Width and height of the image in pixels

top.description: If the image is rendered above others

x.description: X-Position of the image on the given axis in pixels

y.description: Y-Position of the image on the given axis in pixels

x2.description: X-Position to be added to the original X-Position of the image on the given axis in pixels

y2.description: Y-Position to be added to the original X-Position of the image on the given axis in pixels

xy.description: X- and Y-position of the image in pixels. Compact form of x and y attributes.

xy2.description: X- and Y-position of the image in pixels, to be added to the original position. Compact form of x2 and y2 attributes.

xFactor.description: Factor which the X-position is multiplied with

yFactor.description: Factor which the Y-position is multiplied with

x2Factor.description: Factor which the X2-position is multiplied with

y2Factor.description: Factor which the Y2-position is multiplied with

xyFactor.description: X- and Y-factor which is multiplied with the X and Y-position. Compact form of xFactor and yFactor attributes.

xy2Factor.description: X- and Y-factor which is multiplied with the X2 and Y2-position. Compact form of x2Factor and y2Factor attributes.

xOffset.description: X-offset which is added to the X-position

yOffset.description: Y-offset which is added to the Y-position

x2Offset.description: X-offset which is added to the X2-position

y2Offset.description: Y-offset which is added to the Y2-position

xyOffset.description: X- and Y-offset which is added to the X and Y-position. Compact form of xOffset and yOffset attributes.

xy2Offset.description: X- and Y-offset which is added to the X and Y-position. Compact form of x2Offset and y2Offset attributes.

item.description: Associated item. use "@" to apply the current location's name as the checked item name (e.G. if it is a chest).

items.description: Associated item, or a list thereof. use "@" to apply the current location's name as the checked item name (e.G. if it is a chest).

imgStage.description: specifies which img entry to use based on the declared item's stage.

^t(emplate)?$.description: Template to use, without the leading underscores. Can reference an element of the __template entry of the appropriate type.

entryPoint.description: If the given location is a starting point. Used for pathing.

connectsTo.description: Which other locations this location connects to. Used for pathing.

connectsOneWayTo.description: Which other locations this location leads to, without being able to take the same connection back. Used for pathing.

connectsOneWayFrom.description: Which other locations this location can be reached from, but not go to itself. Used for pathing.

^t(emplate)?$.description: Template to use, without the leading underscores. Can reference an element of the __template entry of the appropriate type.

itemComparisons.description: Collection of items to check for. Accepts an item name, or an object with item name keys with concrete numeric values, a list of accepted values or comparisons like "<5"

connection.description: Connection description. Can be an item comparison, or an array of item comparisons of which one must be fulfilled to count as connected.
